label: HandleJames
m: Cool! James is an integrated platform for credit risk management backed by state-of-the-start machine learning.
My main responsibility is to build production-ready systems based on data science.
I turn research code into robust, maintainable and scalable backend services, easily deployable and reusable.
I also develop high-quality software libraries which are used by our applications and teams.
Sounds interesting? I look forward to hear from you!
